text:
In the documentation there is no word of the environment variable REMOTE_USER, 
which is set if a user was successful authorized by apache authentication, nor 
in the documentation of the responsible modules. I think it would be helpful 
if it is clear that such a variable exists and is set by the authentication 
module.
creator: t.hartwig@crapoud.com
slive@apache.org
text:
This is documented in the CGI specification, which is referenced in several
places in the apache docs including:
http://httpd.apache.org/docs-2.0/env.html
(Standard CGI Variables)
http://httpd.apache.org/docs-2.0/mod/mod_cgi.html
(CGI Environment Variables)

We try not to duplicate external documentation when we can avoid it.

Thanks for using Apache!
